clues.title: Description of the Missing Courier
clues.description: A young woman, slight build, red scarf, nervous hands. Last seen leaving the Tooley Street dosshouse before dawn two nights ago. The night-keeper Briggs remembers her â€” she paid in advance and asked no questions.

clues.title: Contents of the Package
clues.description: The package contained a list of Lamplighter informants embedded within three rival factions. The courier was instructed to destroy it rather than allow capture. In the wrong hands, the list is a death warrant for every name on it.
